column4: okay guys -- i really need help now.  i thought that maybe my DVD drive wasnt mounted so i put the dvd in the drive and hit the 'mount DVD drive' button in my panel and it says :
how do i correct this error:
There were no decoders found to handle the stream in file "dvd://", you might need to install the corresponding plugins
dvds with css aren't supported, but you can found the packages on the marillat repository
